name: Rock Air Hero
short_description: Rock air hero is a musical webcam based game . The goal is to play on a "virtual" guitar with nothing but your hands. Tested on Linux (32 & 64 bits), Windows (32 bits) and MacOSX intel 10.5. May work on other platforms
